data.title: View Your Site on OSX and Safari

summary.content: I came across a website that shows you what your website looks like in Safari 1.1 under Mac OS X 10.3. I think it’s awfully amazing myself. This will definitely help me with some of my Mac development. I never realized how good the web looks on Mac OS X. It’s so much different than on Mac OS 9. Mac OS 9 looks disgusting compared to Windows XP, and XP looks bad compared to OSX. Hat tip: Taylor McKnight.

content.html:

content.source:
I came across a website that [shows you what your website looks like in Safari 1.1 under Mac OS X 10.3]({{% wayback "http://www.danvine.com/capture/" %}}). I think it’s awfully amazing myself. This will definitely help me with some of my Mac development. I never realized how *good* the web looks on Mac OS X. It’s so much different than on Mac OS 9. Mac OS 9 looks disgusting compared to Windows XP, and XP looks bad compared to OSX.

Hat tip: [Taylor McKnight]({{% wayback "http://www.gtmcknight.com/" %}}).
